int Texture::loadTexture ( string  Name,
bool  png,
bool  nearest 
)

Load a texture and save it in OpenGL

Parameters:
Name filename of the texture without file ending
png directly load a png (without trying to load the bmp with the same name first)
nearest filter the texture with "nearest" option (used for displacement mapping)
Returns:
the texture handler
